0111000110010001 0100110000101100 1 -> sum: 1011110110111110, cout: 0
0100001011001000 1111010001110100 1 -> sum: 0011011100111101, cout: 1

0100111110010000 1101010011110100 0 -> sum: 0010010010000100, cout: 1

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
